briefTitle: Pivotal Study (Pharmacokinetics, Efficacy, Safety) of BAX 326 (rFIX) in Hemophilia B Patients
officialTitle: Recombinant Factor IX (BAX 326): A Phase 1/3, Prospective, Controlled, Multicenter Study Evaluating Pharmacokinetics, Efficacy, Safety and Immunogenicity in Previously Treated Patients With Severe or Moderately Severe Hemophilia B
summary: The purpose of this pivotal Phase 1/3 study is to determine the pharmacokinetic (PK) parameters, the hemostatic efficacy, and the safety of BAX 326, a recombinant factor IX, in previously treated patients (PTPs) with severe and moderately severe hemophilia B.

primaryOutcome.measure: Study Part 1- Area Under the Plasma Concentration Versus Time Curve From 0 to 72 Hours Per Dose
